TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class TouchDevice : System.Windows.Input.InputDevice, System.Windows.Input.IManipulator
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TouchDevice extends System.Windows.Input.InputDevice implements class System.Windows.Input.IManipulator
Public MustInherit Class TouchDevice Inherits InputDevice Implements IManipulator
public ref class TouchDevice abstract : System::Windows::Input::InputDevice, System::Windows::Input::IManipulator
type TouchDevice = class inherit InputDevice interface IManipulator

summary.span: 表示触摸屏上的一个手指产生的单个触控输入。

span.span: Represents a single touch input produced by a finger on a touchscreen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用 属性访问 。You typically access a by using the property. 一个 表示屏幕上的单个触摸。A represents a single touch on a screen. 如果存在多个接触，请使用 属性来区分它们。If multiple touches are present, use the property to distinguish between them. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含类级别的继承要求，该要求适用于所有成员。This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当派生类不具有完全信任权限时，将引发 。A is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[继承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例通过将两个手指拖到触摸屏上，使你能够在 上创建简单的模式。The following example enables you to create simple patterns on a by dragging two fingers on a touchscreen. 每个触控由 中的 表示。Each touch is represented by a in the . 通过在触控提供的触摸点之间绘制一条线来创建模式。The pattern is created by drawing a line between the touch points that are provided by the touches. 此示例需要 Windows 触摸屏兼容屏幕。This example requires a Windows Touch-compatible screen. 下面的标记将创建用户界面，该用户界面包含网格中居中的 ，并附加触控事件的事件处理程序。The following markup creates the user interface, which consists of a that is centered in a grid, and attaches the event handlers for the touch events. [!code-xaml[TouchEventsSample#000](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/toucheventssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#000)] 下面的代码处理触控事件。The following code handles the touch events. 在 上按下某个触摸时， 将捕获到 中。When a touch is pressed on the , the is captured to the . 在提起触摸后，会释放 。When the touch is lifted, the is released. 触摸 上移动时，将检查 。When a touch moves on the , the is checked. 如果移动来自第一次触摸，则会记录其位置。If the move came from the first touch, its location is recorded. 如果移动从第二个触摸开始，则从第一个触摸的位置到第二个触摸的位置绘制线条。If the move came from the second touch, a line is drawn from the position of the first touch to the position of the second touch. [!code-csharp[TouchEventsSample#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/toucheventssample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#100)] [!code-vb[TouchEventsSample#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/toucheventssample/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#100)]
